attributes.action: Require more support for the self employed  from the government
attributes.additional_details: The self employed are suffering with no support from the government. Been lockdown again since December and will get no help till end of April /may 2021 when the last grant was in November. How does the government expect you to live . This is not fair . The government need to put in place support like the furlough scheme for the self employed.
attributes.background: Since covid started in March 2020. I being an hairdresser have only been allowed to work for 4 months due to all the lockdowns . The support from the government has been horrendous . There is a six month gap between grant 3 and 4 . How are we supposed to live ? Urgently help the self employed?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568087

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554500
